name: Chomper's Adventure 2
description:
Join Chomper Chomp and the rest of his friends on an amazing adventure! The spiritual sequel to the original Chomper's Adventure, but only with a new storyline, new gameplay, and new features! Here's a list of all the new stuff added to the game!

  • New Storyline!
  • Dialogue!
  • Save Points!
  • New Hub Worlds!
  • New Characters!
  • New Levels!

So, whatcha waiting for? Play the game today, it's a Chompin' good time!
